sections.heading: Department created--Secretary as head
sections.text:
1-46A-1. Department created--Secretary as head.

There is hereby created a Department of Veterans Affairs. The head of the Department of Veterans Affairs is the secretary of veterans affairs who shall be appointed and serve pursuant to the provisions of the Constitution of the State of South Dakota, Article IV, ยง9.

Source:SL 2011, ch 1 (Ex. Ord. 11-1), ยง19, eff. Apr. 12, 2011.

sections.heading: Consultation--South Dakota Veterans Council.
sections.text:
1-46A-5. Consultation--South Dakota Veterans Council.

The Department of Veterans Affairs may consult with the South Dakota Veterans Council on matters relating to veterans and their dependents.

The South Dakota Veterans Council consists of six congressionally chartered Veterans Organizations including the Paralyzed Veterans of America, the Disabled American Veterans, the Military Order of the Purple Heart, the American Legion, the Vietnam Veterans of America chapters 1054 and 959, and the Veterans of Foreign Wars.

Source:SL 2020, ch 140, ยง 1.
